name: CliffiesDecor
tagline: Crazy new blocks, Clay Soldiers, and more!
body:
I will use this as a place to put info and stuff for the mod, later.

For now, it will be for install instructions and downloads.

How to install:
Download cliffiesdecor.jar, put in mods folder, using the latest version of forge.
Done!  You'll get the blocks and whatnot.
If you want even MORE cool loot, install my fork of Clay Soldiers alongside the mod, and you'll get more kinds of claysoldiers and probably more loot to come!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
